short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your Facebook group members into leads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FaceGroupNinja allows you to convert Facebook group members request into leads by simply approving them.

By using FaceGroupNinja you are able to store members emails and question answers.

Approved member can be connected with your favorite email marketing tool or exported into CSV file.
